sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Certain Class B Ordinary Shares of BEST SPAC I Acquisition Corp. are subject to a Lock-Up Agreement Ending on 13-DEC-2025.
feed.summary: BEST SPAC I Acquisition Corp. (BSAA) has certain Class B Ordinary Shares under a lock-up agreement set to expire on December 13, 2025. This lock-up period began on June 12, 2025, and lasts for 184 days. The agreement also includes transfer restrictions on founder shares and private placement units for the sponsor, officers, and directors.
